body_html:
Hi @jramseyer, whoops sorry I wasn't more clear :) I mean to use CompilationUnit to compile the test program as a string rather than from the Python AST. Like this:

import torch

cu = torch.jit.CompilationUnit('''
def the_method(i0):
    return i0.permute(())
'''

print(cu.graph) // I think this is right? maybe not

body:
Hi @jramseyer, whoops sorry I wasn't more clear :) I mean to use CompilationUnit to compile the test program as a string rather than from the Python AST. Like this:

```
import torch

cu = torch.jit.CompilationUnit('''
def the_method(i0):
    return i0.permute(())
'''

print(cu.graph) // I think this is right? maybe not
